article: The telephone rings and Sue answers it. "  _  I speak to Mrs Potts, please?" a man asks. "I'm afraid you've got the wrong  _  ," Sue says. "I'm sorry," the man says. A few minutes later the telephone rings  _  . Sue  _  it. It is the same man. He makes a mistake again. Three minutes  _  the telephone rings once more, but she  doesn't  answer it this time, It rings and rings. Her mother hears the  _  . "Why  _  you answer the phone, Sue? she calls. "Oh, all right," Sue says. "I'm sure it's that man again." But she is  _  . It is her father and he is very  _  . Sue keeps him waiting.
